name: Chicken Rice Dreams
description:
Chicken Rice is life.
If one does not dream of Chicken Rice, is one truly Singaporean?

Made in Unity for the Singapore Heritage Game Jam 2020.

This game has two major endings - Tradition and Innovation. The game's message is centered around these two endings. (To judges - please play both endings! You get them by following or not following the instructions given to you.)

If the game lags, please use the Windows build.
